summary: This document appears to be a fragment of an email interface or list showing email metadata, including a specific email from an Executive Assistant to Jeffrey Epstein regarding a missing essay for a FIT application. It shows a series of email timestamps from early February 2007.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: Mentioned by his Executive Assistant in an email regarding a missing essay for a FIT application.

persons.name: Executive Assistant to Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: Sent an email stating that Jeffrey Epstein wants the recipient to fax their essay for a FIT application, as it was not received.

connections.description: The assistant is acting on behalf of Jeffrey Epstein, relaying his request regarding a FIT application essay.

events.title: Email regarding missing FIT essay
events.description: An Executive Assistant to Jeffrey Epstein emails a recipient stating that Jeffrey wants them to fax their essay for a FIT application, as it was not received.

keyFacts: An email from February 8, 2007, shows an Executive Assistant to Jeffrey Epstein communicating about a FIT application essay.
The assistant states 'Jeffrey wants you to fax your essay as well...we did not receive it.'
The document is a fragment showing email metadata with timestamps from early February 2007.
